org.apache.jackrabbit.core.cluster
Interface LockEventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
LockManagerImpl
public interface LockEventListener

Interface used to receive information about incoming, external lock events.

Method Summary

          Handle an external lock operation.
 void externalUnlock(NodeId nodeId)
          Handle an external unlock operation.
 

Method Detail

externalLock

public void externalLock(NodeId nodeId,
                         boolean isDeep,
                         String userId)
                  throws RepositoryException
Handle an external lock operation.

Parameters:
nodeId - node id
isDeep - true if the lock is deep; false otherwise
userId - user id
Throws:
RepositoryException - if the lock cannot be processed

externalUnlock

public void externalUnlock(NodeId nodeId)
                    throws RepositoryException
Handle an external unlock operation.

Parameters:
nodeId - node id
Throws:
RepositoryException - if the unlock cannot be processed
